_comment: DISABLED - API Shield Schema Validation was blocking legitimate requests
_issues: Schema mismatch - OpenAPI schema too strict vs actual requests
Missing optional fields - Schema required fields app doesn't always send
Wrong data types - Schema expected different formats than actual
Extra fields - Requests had fields not defined in schema
Nested object structure - Fingerprint object structure didn't match exactly
_fix_needed: Capture actual request - Log real request from working browser call
Update OpenAPI schema - Match exact structure of working requests
Make fields optional - Use required: [] only for truly mandatory fields
Allow additional properties - Add additionalProperties: true
Test incrementally - Enable, test one module, fix schema, repeat
_recommendation: Keep API Shield disabled - WAF + rate limiting is sufficient security
